sub_title: Ex-Apple. MBA. Actively Seeking Operations, Logistics and Strategy Opportunities in The Netherlands. Work Permit Holder since May 2022.
summary:
Ex-Apple. Seeking Business Development and Sales, Project Management, Internal Consulting or Corporate Strategy positions where I can contribute to sustain the growth and development of a company through expansion into other regions by devising new market strategies, improving sales and management of accounts, and collaborating to contribute to the high level strategic positioning of a company.

In the previous role managed Supply and Demand of Apple iPhones for the Asia Pacific, Australia-NZ and Japan Regions for 4 years out of Singapore.

MBA - Class of 2017 at The Ohio State University Fisher College of Business.

I am at my best in a Business Development and Corporate Strategy role where I contribute to the planning and developing of business strategies based on data driven decisions. Using intelligible data derived from big data and making strategic business decisions based on the analysis is where I specialise. I bring with me the recent experience of working in Operations at Apple managing supply and demand for iPhones for APAC, ANZ and Japan Regions along with past experience in Customer Analytics and Insights for a Fortune 100 Insurance company through the course of my MBA program. The past entrepreneurial experience and perspective helps me to contribute in capitalising new and existing market opportunities to provide resourceful business solutions. 

3+ years of entrepreneurial experience launching and successfully running a startup, Probitas Verify, one of the 1st Indian Risk Mitigation companies where I have been involved in all stages of business development and client management roles - from innovating new products to conceptualising technology and improving processes.

1 year of experience of working with Atos, Europe's Largest IT Consulting Company as a Software Engineer handling issue resolution and ticket management roles and co-operating with Dutch Team to handle critical changes in Mediation for Network Operators application for KPN Netherlands without any outage.

With extensive participation in sports, I have learned the value of being a team player and leading without authority. I take pride in working with integrity and collective responsibility.

Specialties : Business Development, Product Management, Operations, Planning, Sales, Data Science, Data Analytics, Corporate Strategy.

profile_positions.description:
Managing Supply and Demand of Apple iPhones for the Asia Pacific, Australia-NZ and Japan Regions out of Apple APAC HQ in Singapore. Depth of role included Supply Planning, Demand Planning, Logistics planning, Predictive Analytics for Logistical Projections and Forecasting, Inventory Management and Project Management.

Managed multiple projects including setting up warehouses in China, managing inventory to follow Thailand government regulations and managing introduction of new systems to reserve supply for Online, Retail and Reseller channels for iPhones for APAC.
profile_positions.title: Regional Planner

profile_positions.description:
Nationwide Insurance

• Evaluated online auto insurance quote process and proposed data substantiated modification to online quote and bind with big YOY impact on bottom line
• Analyzed patterns of past CI&A studies through Amazon's mTurk tool and validated similarities to Nationwide direct customers, leading to huge potential savings for Nationwide
• Data Analytic Tools used: Teradata, R Studio, Tableau, Omniture, Excel and Visual Basic

Using Data Analytics, Customer Insights and Marketing Analytics to make strategic project decisions and implementations. Working closely with Senior Managers and Leaders to use data to bridge gap between analysts and managers.

Nationwide Center for Advanced Customer Insights

• Researched and published white paper on Fraudulent Ad Bots and the impact on Nationwide, influencing Nationwide Next report, limiting company's ad fraud exposure rate significantly
• Investigated the introduction of Facebook Bots and proposed opportunities for Nationwide to push towards targeting millennials without uncovering sensitive information
• Collaborated with diverse associates at the center to absorb qualitative research methodologies and perceive consumer behavior and its impact on marketing strategy
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist Intern & Graduate Research Associate

profile_positions.description:
• Build a Market Entry Strategy and implementation outlook for RG Barry to foray into the Chinese marketplace for their brands Dearfoams and Baggallini
• Strategic entry plan included partnership with big brand retailers and simultaneously entering the different eCommerce platforms with specific details on how to avoid the imitation market and protect brand against knock offs
profile_positions.title: Global Applied Project (GAP) Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Business Innovation and Entrepreneurial Development
•	Innovated a First in Segment – Live Status Updates for cases product.
•	Integrated the Live Status Updates product with an In-house developed software, reducing Turnaround Time by up to 30%.
•	Working on a First in India website for Pre-Verified Matrimonial Partners.
•	Mentored and lead a Business Development team of four to develop product strategies for future markets - signing major global clients.


VP Technology and Product
•	Designed In-house software - built its development life cycle blueprint, elucidated operation and quality. Elicited requirements from operations team to define scope and direction of final product.
•	Mentored and led a multi-disciplinary team of 3 engineers to build software in accordance to the operation scenarios following training on Visual Studio 2010 and Oracle 10g, within 4 months. Improved man hours spent on each case by 20%.
•	Collaborated with business development team and website development team to design/launch official Company Website.
•	Designed and guided strategies to promote and digitally market www.probitasverify.com .


Entrepreneurship and Personnel Management
•	Fostered Client Relations & improved Quality Assurance by enhancing Report Accuracy up to 99%.
•	Prepared and integrated team to work ethics and cultural assimilation through life skills facilitation.
•	Collaborated with multi-disciplinary teams working under different domains constantly adapting and innovating to compete in transforming market requirements.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder and VP (Technology & Product)

IT Technician & Consultant
Client – KPN Telecom, Netherlands

•	Operated back-office and Ticket Management, providing customer service with best-in-team Resolution Rate - 99.4%.
•	Collaborated with Netherlands Clients to implement changes in important Mediation for Network Operators application. Validated and successfully administered change without any Outage or loss of data.
